ygData.subject: A foremer Decepticon Ruler joins the NBW
ygData.msgSnippet: The scene is by the cliff where the Axalon tumbled into the sea. A loud rumbling is coming from the water. At first it is just a noise, but than the water

Subject: A foremer Decepticon Ruler joins the NBW

The scene is by the cliff where the Axalon tumbled into the sea. A 
loud rumbling is coming from the water. At first it is just a noise, 
but than the water starts to buble, and steam rises from it. Than in 
a huge explosion, a cylinder of water shoots up into the sky. It 
reaches up to the cliff. A large bot stood upon it, and walked onto 
the cliff. It smiled with an evil grin, and lauhged out loud.



"Yes! Finaly, after eons of time, I have returned! Now I have a body 
witout another Spark inside it. Now I can begin my reign of 
destruction, as a new and improved Predacon! But whose body did I 
take? By some leftover memory files, it belonged to a Maximal. A 
Maximal named Octociz. No matter. It has been clensed of Maximal 
flith, now that I inhabit it. Now I must find the Predacons. There 
will be no more trying to win over rule now. The last time I tried, I 
became Emperor just before my body was destroyed. So now I..."

The Predacon fell over in pain. New body parts started springing up 
all over the place. When the pain stopped, the bot stood up.

"My Spark...it had become to strong to enhabit  a normal body. I 
have...thre forms now. Bot, Octocpus and Jet! A jet, good. It reminds 
me of the Great War. Now, my sensors detect a cave filled with 
Predacons. This must be the base. I will go there, and start at the 
bottom of the ladder. For now that I may travel at land, at sea and 
at air vey well, no enemy is safe from me. I, Starscream, shall 
destroy the Maximals!!!!!"

Starscream transformed to Jet mode and took of towards the Predacon 
cave.
